section.title: measure

listitem.para: double measure ( atom|int ''i'', atom|int ''j'', atom|int ''k'', atom|int ''l'' )

section.para: This command is a general measuring tool, able to measure distances, angles, and torsions, depending on how many arguments are supplied.
For example:
returns the distance between atoms 1 and 2.
